newsitem.title: USA: News Corp's Fox Kids IPO on hold - report.
newsitem.headline: News Corp's Fox Kids IPO on hold - report.

text.p: News Corp has put its $150 million Fox Kids Worldwide Inc initial public offering on hold, Daily Variety said on Thursday, citing analysts.
According to analysts who listened to a company conference call, News Corp finance executive Bill Sorenson declined to elaborate on reasons for the decision, Variety said.
Variety said the Fox Children's Network would be dramatically affected if News Corp succeeded in buying control of the Family Channel, which could explain the move.

Sorenson also told Wall Street analysts the company was "continuing to work" with EchoStar Communications Corp to resolve differences that have threatened to unravel the two companies' satellite-television partnership, the report said, citing analysts who listened to the call.
Sorenson was quoted by Variety as declining to give any time-frame on when the two companies would reach a decision.
